content: thank you for downloading my pattern to crochet your very own finch i m releasing this pattern for free with the intention of paying forward the kindness of my guardian ♡ please do not distribute this pattern as is or attempt to claim it as your own this pattern is untested and the first i ve ever written so if you find any mistakes i would really appreciate it if you politely let me know so that i can correct it i made my finches with sweet snuggles yarn and a 6mm hook but you could use any similar jumbo 7 weight yarn i used around 250 yards total and the finished product is 15 inches tall and 10 inches wide with the wings down at the sides you could also make this with a worsted weight yarn to get a smaller version of your finch i would recommend a 3 - 4mm hook if you go this route there is some colorwork in this pattern rounds 24 - 36 of the body/head to get the shape of the headpatch correct the body and head are all crocheted in one piece with the arms beak and feet sewn on later the body and head are the only part of this project that are stuffed this pattern is worked in the round without joining between rounds i recommend using a stitch marker to keep track of your first stitch in each round materials ● 6mm crochet hook or whatever works best for your yarn/gauge ● approx 100 - 110 yards of color #1 body and face ● approx 100 - 110 yards of color #2 headpatch and arms ● approx 20 - 30 yards of of color #3 beak and feet ● stuffing ● safety eyes i used 30mm ● darning needle ● scissors glossary us terms ● chain chain ● slip_stitch slip_stitch ● single_crochet single_crochet ● increase increase 2 single_crochet in the same stitch ● decrease decrease ○ i recommend the invisible decrease method it s worth looking up a quick youtube tutorial if you aren t familiar it keeps gaps from showing between the stitches in a decrease ● * * repeat ● # stitch count at the end of the round body/head using color #1 start with a ch4 and slip_stitch to form a circle or use a magic_ring r1 12 single_crochet in the middle of ch4/magic_ring 12 r2 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 r3 *single_crochet 2 increase* x6 24 r4 *single_crochet 3 increase* x6 30 r5 *single_crochet 4 increase* x6 36 r6 *single_crochet 5 increase* x 6 42 r7 *single_crochet 6 increase* x6 48 r8 *single_crochet 7 increase* x 6 54 r9 - r17 single_crochet around 54 r18 *single_crochet 7 decrease* x6 48 r19 single_crochet around 48 start stuffing the body r20 *single_crochet 6 decrease* x6 42 r21 *single_crochet 5 decrease* x6 36 r22 *single_crochet 4 decrease* x6 30 r23 *single_crochet 3 decrease* x6 24 r24 *single_crochet 2 increase* x2 single_crochet 2 switch to color #2 to start
